0.name: Shard Sword
0.fullDesc: Deals <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to an enemy.

1.name: Forest of Swords
1.fullDesc:
Consumes HP equal to {{1, percent}}% of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of {{2, percent}}% of his ATK and {{4, percent}}% of his Max HP to a single enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of {{3, percent}}% of Blade's ATK and {{5, percent}}% of his Max HP to adjacent targets.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using Forest of Swords.
Forest of Swords cannot regenerate Skill Points.
1.shortDesc: Consumes HP and deals Wind DMG to an enemy, as well as minor Wind DMG to adjacent targets.

0.name: Hellscape
0.fullDesc:
Consumes HP equal to {{1, percent}}% of Blade's Max HP to enter the Hellscape state.
When Hellscape is active, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by {{4, percent}}%, and his Basic ATK Shard Sword is enhanced to Forest of Swords for {{2}} turn(s).
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill.
This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.
0.shortDesc: Consumes HP to <orangeStrong>Enhance Basic ATK</orangeStrong>, and this turn does not end after this Skill is used.

0.name: Death Sentence
0.fullDesc:
Sets Blade's current HP to 50% of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to a single enemy equal to the sum of {{1, percent}}% of his ATK, {{2, percent}}% of his Max HP, and {{5, percent}}% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of {{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}% of his ATK, {{4, percent}}% of his Max HP, and {{6, percent}}% of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle.
The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at {{7, percent}}% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.
0.shortDesc: Sets current HP to 50% of Max HP, and deals massive Wind DMG to a single enemy and Wind DMG to adjacent targets.

0.name: Shuhu's Gift
0.fullDesc:
When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked.
When Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches a Follow-up ATK on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to {{2, percent}}% of Blade's ATK plus {{4, percent}}% of his Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by {{3, percent}}% of his Max HP. After the Follow-up ATK, all Charges are consumed.
0.shortDesc: When Blade's HP decreases, gains 1 stack of Charge. Upon reaching maximum Charge, launches Follow-up ATK, <orangeStrong>dealing Wind DMG to all enemies</orangeStrong>, restoring HP, and consuming all Charges.

0.name: Karma Wind
0.fullDesc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes {{2, percent}}% of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of his Max HP to all enemies.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.
0.shortDesc: Attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes own HP and deals Wind DMG to all enemies.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Vita Infinita
0.fullDesc: When Blade's current HP percentage is at 50% of Max HP or lower, Incoming Healing increases by {{1, percent}}%.

0.name: Neverending Deaths
0.fullDesc: If Blade hits a Weakness Broken enemy after using "Forest of Swords," he will restore HP equal to {{1, percent}}% of his Max HP plus {{2}}.

0.name: Cyclone of Destruction
0.fullDesc: Increases DMG dealt by the Talent's Follow-up ATK by {{1, percent}}%.

1.name: Blade Cuts the Deepest in Hell
1.desc:
Blade's Ultimate deals additionally increased DMG to a single enemy target, with the increased amount equal to {{1, percent}}% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle.
The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at {{2, percent}}% of his Max HP. The tally value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

2.name: Ten Thousand Sorrows From One Broken Dream
2.desc: When Blade is in the Hellscape state, his CRIT Rate increases by {{1, percent}}%.

3.name: Hardened Blade Bleeds Coldest Shade
3.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

4.name: Rejected by Death, Infected With Life
4.desc: When Blade's current HP percentage drops to 50% or lower of his Max HP, increases his Max HP by {{1, percent}}%. Stacks up to {{2}} time(s).

5.name: Death By Ten Lords' Gaze
5.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.name: Reborn Into an Empty Husk
6.desc: The maximum number of Charge stacks is reduced to 4. The Follow-up ATK triggered by Talent deals additionally increased DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of Blade's Max HP.
